entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:18 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 9:00 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: NE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
